title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS
text: Stan's backyard, day. The boys are playing the "Investigative Reports with Bill Curtis" game when Timmy and Jimmy arrive

text: Hey fellas.

text: Timmy!!!

text: Say fellas, JImmy and I were wondering if maybe you would come and cheer for us next Sssaturday. We're both competing in the Special Olympics down in Denver.

text: They're Olympic games for handicapped people.

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS
text: Stan's house, front yard. The boys are playing with various toy big rigs. Stan moves a gas truck, Kenny an ambulance, Kyle a tow truck

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS
text: YOU GUYS! YOU GUYS! I have the best idea ever! I'm gonna be rich!

text: What?

text: Dude, I was just looking at the Special Olympics brochure, and check this shit out: "At the end of the Special Olympics, a Grand Champion Special Athlete is crowned and given a cash prize of $1000"

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS

text: So?? So dude, think about it. If somebody just pretended to be mentally handicapped, they could easily win the competition and get the thousand bucks!

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS
text: Oh no. Cartman, no!

text: It's flawless! I'll act like I have a disability, and when the time come to compete I'll kick ass against all the handicappeds!

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS

All I have to do is make people think I'm handicapped, and I get a thousand dollars. It won't be easy, but nothing worth having ever is.

title: UP THE DOWN STEROIDS
text: Jimmy's house, bedroom, night. Jimmy is at his bed. He straps on a strip of heavy rubberband, dabs his arm a few times with alcohol, jabs the syringe into his arm and injects some liquids steroids into his arm. I just want a chance to change.  Help me change?
